name: Otter's World
description:
In an otter world...

An otter hoists his desert beagle...

to save what he loves from otter-worldly lifeforms.

'Otter's World' is a survival-management game, where you play as Otto the Otter as he defends his lake from Cthulhu and it's minions!

Key features:

  • DID YOU KNOW? Otter's have the thickest fur of all mammals.
  • Otters hold hands when they sleep so as to not float away.
  • Otters have a lot of gun in their lakes - just in case something (or someone) needs to be put in the gutter.
  • Did you know: Otters lives are stacked on top of their fuzzy heads? I guess their "life" is just "formed" differently.

Controls:

Use WASD and IJKL to use Otto the Otter's hands to pick up stuff, load and shoot your gun, and stack hearts to push away Cthulhu.

Stuff to pick up:

  • Gun - Used for firing bullets. Starts off unloaded. (Be careful not to throw it away!)
  • Bullet - Loaded in Gun.
  • Heart - Is stacked on your head to win the game.
  • Eldritch Blob - Takes a heart if picked up.
  • Duck - Quacks.

Credits: Team Barnaclebean

Soondun - Programming

SoBigMuscles- 2D Art

LaurJam - Audio, Programming
